remarks: A correspondence between elements of specific GCD and relative primes in a smaller ring.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Sep-2015.)
statement:
hashgcdlem.a $e |- A = { y e. ( 0 ..^ ( M / N ) ) | ( y gcd ( M / N ) ) = 1 } $.
hashgcdlem.b $e |- B = { z e. ( 0 ..^ M ) | ( z gcd M ) = N } $.
hashgcdlem.f $e |- F = ( x e. A |-> ( x x. N ) ) $.
hashgcdlem $p |- ( ( M e. NN /\ N e. NN /\ N || M ) -> F : A -1-1-onto-> B ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d M x y $.
$d M x z $.
$d N x y $.
$d N x z $.
